posts.post_content: Strictly worse than [Incinerate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Incinerate), but strictly better than [Volcanic Hammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Volcanic Hammer). Well, I guess this is where we'll land for a year. Frankly though, the regeneration clause is irrelevant most of the time, so I think any deck will just take out Incinerates 1-for-1 for this come September.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: It amuses me that, at time of writing, this card is rated 2.265 while [Volcanic Hammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Volcanic Hammer) is rated 2.721, despite being *way* worse. I guess people are harder on new cards, especially after being spoiled by [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt) for a couple sets.

Posted By: Zetan (7/26/2012 5:28:55 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I'm not gonna be popular by saying this, but yes, I agree that people have been spoiled by the very powerful [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt).  
They now use it as a measuring stick to which every burn spell is to be compared too.  
For me it's just sad that people take Lightning Bolt for granted and consider the others trash. That shouldn't be the case. Those people should realise that Lightning Bolt was VERY strong. It shouldn't, by all means, be the "standard" burn spell.
posts.html:
I'm not gonna be popular by saying this, but yes, I agree that people have been spoiled by the very powerful Lightning Bolt.
They now use it as a measuring stick to which every burn spell is to be compared too.
For me it's just sad that people take Lightning Bolt for granted and consider the others trash. That shouldn't be the case. Those people should realise that Lightning Bolt was VERY strong. It shouldn't, by all means, be the "standard" burn spell.

posts.post_content: I'd have to say this is about on par with [Shock](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shock). Not as good as Bolt or [Incinerate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Incinerate), sure, but it can still do some damage and honestly Bolt is ridiculously good. There probably isn't ever going to be a cheap red spell better than Bolt, so I'm fine with this for now. Besides, it's not too bad. Better than [Volcanic Hammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Volcanic Hammer) at least.

Really? How often do you actually see regeneration anymore? Look at all the top decks in ANY format and you'll see... Actually, I can't see any. Point; yes, Incinerate is better, but that's no reason to slash a perfectly balanced card to two and a half stars.  
  
Besides, with [Goblin Electromancer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Electromancer) and Guttersnipe, its as fine a spell as [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt) ever was.
